rules_text:
Ward–Exile a card from your hand, a permanent you control, and a card from your graveyard.
Each nonland card in your hand without atavistic has atavistic {5}{C}{C}. [i](You may cast that spell for {5}{C}{C}. If it’s a nonpermanent spell, put it onto the battlefield after it resolves. That spell becomes a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature on the battlefield.)[/i]
